data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon now affecting southern China will moderate slightly today. It will be warm during the day over the region. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China tonight to Tuesday at first. It will be generally fine and very dry over the region in the middle and latter parts of this week. It will be cool in the morning and at night, with a rather large temperature difference between day and night. Besides, the area of low pressure now to the east of the Philippines will develop gradually and move towards the Philippines today and tomorrow. It will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea in the middle and latter parts of this week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251124","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3, north force 4 to 5 at night.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
